member.name: T:OxyPlot.Metro.OxyColorConverter
member.summary: Converts from OxyPlot colors to Windows.UI.Color and vice versa.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.Metro.ThicknessConverter
member.remarks: This is used to convert BorderThickness properties to Path.StrokeThickness (double). The maximum thickness value is used.

member.returns: The maximum value of the thickness.

member.summary: Invoked whenever application code or internal processes (such as a rebuilding layout pass) call ApplyTemplate. In simplest terms, this means the method is called just before a UI element displays in your app. Override this method to influence the default post-template logic of a class.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Metro.TrackerDefinition.TrackerKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker key.
member.remarks: The Plot will use this property to find the TrackerDefinition that matches the TrackerKey of the current series.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Metro.TrackerDefinition.TrackerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker template.
member.remarks: The tracker control will be added/removed from the Tracker overlay as necessary. The DataContext of the tracker will be set to a TrackerHitResult with the current tracker data.
